title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message:
Hello

I have A1425 and power off randomly one day working without any problem then shutdown machine by user 2 hour later cant open when OS loading or login screen power off.

Machine not have serial ( user said apple changed board in warranty but i m not sure) ASD gives this error;

Any idea where can i start?

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: This is a sensor on the IO board. Swap IO board and/or cable.

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: I also replaced know good items:( didint change.

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: pin 34 and 36 on J4410 are data lines to this sensor. Is the airport card working normally?

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: Yes when machine start normally airport is working. ( When i didn't connect I/O board,hard drive,battery also continue same problem)

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: The missing sensor should also not cause the board to shut down. Any signs of liquid damage or was it dropped? Does it still shut down with IO board disconnected?

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: Customer said nothing happen but as you know users newer drops and liquid damage:)  Not signs of liquid and case defective..   when i disconnect I/O board problem is continue.

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: I honestly have no idea. Have you disconnected everything including trackpad and keyboard? Fan will run on full but it should not shut down.

title: 820-3462-A randomly power off
message: Problem is solved after reflow PCB by oven. Thanks.
